__e: I am the queen and you must know that the throne is mine... and you have to give it to me, if not I'll send you all to the caverns.
I'm telling you this because you must know the truth and because I want a future for my child and yours.
I have evidence here that you need to know about now before it's too late!
You may be two of the stupidest teens I've ever encountered. And that's saying something.
You boys must come up on stuff like this all the time.
If he is gone, you must have chosen another.
You must not be like a woman... who is just weak, and he can't speak, even talk.
If you go with someone... you should be friends as well as lovers.
When you have reached this standard, what you should do...
For the last time, why must you make this so difficult for yourselves?
You gotta make this world a better place to live in.
I think that means you're supposed to be here.
If for no other reason than this ... through all the insane crap we have gone through, the one thing I've known, without a doubt, the whole time... is you and Fitz belong together.
Now that the games are so close, you must all be thinking about it.
You were so cold that night, and you're upset. It may happen to anyone on the day of father's funeral.
So, you boys need to look good which is not a state you find yourselves in altogether naturally.
Well, I see no reason why both of you shouldn't have a very happy future.
